response.overview: Seyithan(12) is a boy who lives in a rough village of Sırnak. His teacher, just before the semester holiday, gives every each students one of the tales of the thousand and one nights  along their course books. Seyithan, as a child who doesn’t like studying, is not really interested with the book his teacher gave. But one night, on account of a blackout he gets bored and starts to look the pictures of the book. ln a little while, he is amazed by the fairy world of the book. After finishing this amazing tale he starts to a difficult adventure in which he first reaches his classmates’ tales and then all the other fairy tales.
response.title: Alf Leila Wa Leila
